EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify the admins that contact completeness job should run more frequently
EmailTemplate.name: ContactCompleteness_RunJobMore
EmailTemplate.subject: Contact Completion Effort
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello There!
You are receiving this message because the last run of the scheduleContactCompletionEffort for the week needs to be scheduled more frequenty. Try adding an additional job run this week to see if that works.
Thank you, The CareFirst SFDC Development Team
